lore: At the end of its long life, the structure of an Ent changes and a sticky moss begins to cover its body. It is common to find hummingbirds and other small birds around it, and a scientist from Vanelin discovered that they ignore the insects that get trapped in the moss, instead eating the moss itself. The scientist caught one of these creatures to study it and found out that its skin contained a hallucinogenic substance that is addictive to birds.
menagerieDialog: There is nothing quite like the clean air of a Rodian forest.
I'll make short work of anyone who dares desecrate nature.
This castle smells like a wasteland. I would prefer to leave this place at once.
I feel invigorated in your presence. Thank you for looking after me.
(A little bird is nesting in this creature's branches which is oddly endearing.)
name: Elder Ent
